commands.target: books = document.getElementsByClassName('product-caption'); results = []; for (var i = 0; i< books.length; i++){ var book = books[i]; results[i] = book.innerHTML.includes("Agatha") || book.innerHTML.includes("Christie") || book.innerHTML.includes("Агата") || book.innerHTML.includes("Кристи"); } return results;

targets.key: xpath=//select[contains(.,'- Подреди по - Заглавие Най-нови Най-продавани Най-коментирани Най-преглеждани Цена - възходяща Цена - низходяща')]

commands.comment: Select Sort By Price Ascending Option
Make sure the page is fully loaded
Get the query part of the URL and extract the sort criteria
Verify that the sort criteria is ascending
Get all price texts, convert them to numbers and assert they are in increasing order
commands.target: function sorted(arr){ let second_index; for(let first_index = 0; first_index < arr.length; first_index++){ second_index = first_index + 1; if(arr[second_index] - arr[first_index] < 0) return false; } return true; } priceContainers = document.getElementsByClassName("product-caption-discount"); prices = Array.apply(Number, Array(priceContainers.length)).map(function () {}); for (var i = 0; i < priceContainers.length; i++){ realPriceContainer = priceContainers[i].getElementsByClassName("product-caption-price")[0]; if (realPriceContainer == null){ prices[i] = parseFloat(priceContainers[i].getElementsByClassName("text-orange")[0].innerHTML.replace(" лв.", "")); } else{ prices[i]=parseFloat(realPriceContainer.innerHTML); } } return sorted(prices);

targets.key: xpath=//select[contains(.,'- Подреди по - Заглавие Най-нови Най-продавани Най-коментирани Най-преглеждани Цена - възходяща Цена - низходяща')]

commands.comment: Select Sort By Price Decreasing Option
Make sure the page is fully loaded
Extract the query from the URL and get the sort criteria
Verify the sort criteria is price-descending
Fetch the prices of books, convert them to numbers and check the order
commands.target: function sorted(arr){ let second_index; for(let first_index = 0; first_index < arr.length; first_index++){ second_index = first_index + 1; if(arr[second_index] - arr[first_index] > 0) return false; } return true; } priceContainers = document.getElementsByClassName("product-caption-discount"); prices = Array.apply(Number, Array(priceContainers.length)).map(function () {}); for (var i = 0; i < priceContainers.length; i++){ realPriceContainer = priceContainers[i].getElementsByClassName("product-caption-price")[0]; if (realPriceContainer == null){ prices[i] = parseFloat(priceContainers[i].getElementsByClassName("text-orange")[0].innerHTML.replace(" лв.", "")); } else{ prices[i]=parseFloat(realPriceContainer.innerHTML); } } return sorted(prices);

commands.comment: Assert the order of prices is descending

targets.key: xpath=//select[contains(.,'- Подреди по - Заглавие Най-нови Най-продавани Най-коментирани Най-преглеждани Цена - възходяща Цена - низходяща')]

commands.comment: Make sure the page is fully loaded
Get the URL query and the sort criteria
Verify the sort criteria is by title
Fetch the book titles and check their order
commands.target: function sorted(arr){ let second_index; for(let first_index = 0; first_index < arr.length; first_index++){ second_index = first_index + 1; if(arr[second_index] - arr[first_index] < 0) return false; } return true; } titleContainers = document.getElementsByClassName("product-caption-title"); titles = Array.apply(String, Array(titleContainers.length)).map(function () {}); for (var i = 0; i < titleContainers.length; i++){ titles[i] = titleContainers[i].getElementsByTagName("a")[0].innerHTML; } return sorted(titles);

commands.comment: Assert the books are ordered by title

targets.key: xpath=(//a[@onclick="if (!window.__cfRLUnblockHandlers) return false; onProductAddToCart('236213','Малки жени (луксозно издание, нов превод)','Световна детска класика','Хеликон','твърди','18.95','1',''); return !ga.loaded;"])[2]
